About

Me

I’m currently working at Simulmedia as a QA engineer, was formally a Business Analyst working on projects with ARRA (FederalReporting.gov) and the EPA (RMP), and am a Virginia Tech alumna with a B.S. in Business Information Technology.

I live in New York City.
